tags: None
review: Around a month ago,  my father-in-law (aged 69) needed to visit a dentist to get his teeth refitted with caps. He doesn't like visits to hospitals at the best of times and I had quite a struggle convincing him to see Dr. Mareeswari. I had read good reviews about her practice and booked an appointment  through her receptionist. It has to be said at this point that the appointments were always bang on time, never late. Dr. Mareeswari was very friendly and caring and put my difficult to please father- in-law at ease, the moment we met her . My father-in-law had to undergo a root canal treatment and then had to have caps fitted over his teeth. She patiently explained each and every step of the process to be undergone . She took great pains to alleviate  my father-in-law's doubts and anxiety. We are very happy with her and would definitely recommend her because she really cares about her patients and is extremely professional. We also liked the follow-up calls to know how the patient was doing.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would like to share my first wisdom tooth removal experience. I was scared about the pain, but tooth was removed without any pain even the injection given for numbness was like an ant bite. It was awesome. The procedure was simple and doctors are well experienced. I am very thankful to Dr.Mareeswari who was so prompt in finding out what was my problem when she saw the scanning report and x-ray.She answered all my questions with so much of patience and always had a smily face. Dr.Mareeswari and the entire team were kind and the whole clinic had a positive vibe. I travelled 1hr from my location but it is a total worth. Price is reasonable. I strongly recommend this clinic. Happy smile üò¨

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had visited A2Z dental care for scaling and treatment of tooth decay. Dr.Mareeswari was so caring and explained the various treatments available including the filling cost and its benefits. She is very knowledgeable and took complete care and provided the best treatment possible. Throughout the treatment process she kept me informed about  what is going on and ensured I was never in any pain. I filled around  7 teeth and I'm extremely happy with the treatment and feel more confidence  looking at my teeth now. The clinic is well maintained with great hygiene and cost is optimal. I would highly recommend for everyone if you are looking for a dental clinic with great service  from a **** doctor with an optimal cost.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Implant Fixing,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Checkup (General),Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review:
I highly recommend Dr Mareeswari.

My teeth give me trouble and I have consulted with many dentists in India and abroad over the last 7 years. Each dentist did a few procedures, **** ******** *** **** ************ which cost me a lot of money, time and physical discomfort. None of these dentist could actually fix my teeth.

Then I consulted with Dr Mareeswari and I must say I am extremely satisfied with her work. Dr Mareeswari is ****** ******* competent doctor.  You are in safe hands if you are with Dr Mareeswari

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I have a very good expirence to share.I took my kid she is 4 years to treat for a tooth decay. It should be really a hard time to make them understand for what reason they are meeting a doctor. For sure at this age being panic is the first expression we see in their face. But with Dr Mareeswari, this is entirely a new story. She welcomed and greeted my child with her smiling face, that erased the panic. She started speaking with my kid with no bothering of time. She conveyed in a friendly manner,the available types of treatment for kids with pros and corns. 
It will be a great task for us to see her decayed tooth in home, but Dr asked her to show the decayed tooth. We where surprised, she responded immediately with no fear. This showed her kindness and her expirence in handling a kid. I strongly recommend DR Mareeswari for Kids. For sure once you visit the clinic you will get a very good expirence and the real value for your hard earned money.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Went to the her with severe tooth ache.. she was very friendly and  examined all the tooths and clearly  told the problem and compared to my previous experience for root canal, she did a painless root canal ever and a 1 shot best fitted crown.She gave the detailed explanation on different types of crown and cost so i could pick the best oneRegarding treatment during covid situation:she took atmost care that i am safe inside the clinic and the sisters were so supportive from the moment i entered till i exitted.i was give gloves for hands and legs covers.Would highly recommend her for any treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very friendly and one of the must visit dentist if you have tooth problem. They clearly explained the root cause and all available options for us to choose. During the treatment there is no pain and the treatment is worth the cost which is very low compared to others. Very professional and calm in handling patients. The hospital environment is good and there is no wait time. After the treatment, they will take an Xray and show the RCT done in tooth. If you are new to chennai or in need of a good dentist, I strongly suggest to visit this Dental clinic *** **** **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have severe toothache last week. I searched the net to find the nearest dentist and after reading the reviews I just walked in without appointment.The problem was investigated by X-ray and treatment plan and cost is informed before the treatment. Treatment, removal of an old filling and refill was done quickly and efficiently by Dr.Mareeswari and also she explained tips for good oral hygiene.The clinic is very clean. I'd definitely recommend your services to anyone needing dental treatment in the area.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Hii Everybody,Hope my review/feedback help somebody to wisely choose their dentist. Recently I visited Ms Mareeswari as I was suffering from a bad tooth/jaw ache. She examined and suggested a scan for knowing the root reason for the pain. With the scan report it was clear that my tooth has decayed deep into my roots which was the cause for the jaw ache. Doc suggested root canal in order to save the tooth. I was little nervous. But doc explained the root canal process with the help of a animated video and me understand the process is not that complex . In the next sitting root canal was done and further to it crown was fixed. All the treatment was very much smooth without any complication. Doc is very friendly *** ***** ********* ******** *** **** * *** ***** *********. I would strongly recommend Ms Mareeswari for your dental problems.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
Loved the experience I had with a 2 z dental care! Everything about the clinic is great and satisfying, be it the staffs' behaviour or the hygienic and clean environment or the doctor's utmost care. I had a pain free and smooth experience. The doctor has so much compassion that she helped me get rid of my problem by doing RCT. From the way she performed RCT for me I could see that she's very talented and has a lot experience. I will definitely recommend this clinic to my friends and family. 
* Highly satisfied *

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have taken my father who is aged 72 to this clinic today as he was going through severe tooth pain as one of his teeth loosened in his lower left jaw for prolonged days due to weekness. Dr. Mareeshwari attended him and I must thank her for the amazing patience and  in handling the patients with smile always. Generally some old gentlemens are tougher as they would be quite adament because they too are like kids only.. Mareeshwari handled and explained the complications very patiently and her treatment style was pretty cool and painless seeing which my father too stunned. After procedure explanations too very detailed. I would certainly visit again and will recommend to my friends for all ages..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I feel like A2Z Dental Care deserves to be bragged about! From the moment I walked in, everything was clean and professional. Dr.Mareeswari made me feel at ease about my treatment and I am very confident that I chose the right place for all my dental work. I visited the clinic because I had to get Root canal treatment done for three of my teeth. I was under the impression that root canal Treatments take atleast 3 sittings to finish, but Dr. Mareeswari completed my Root Canal treatment in one visit itself! She was amazing and she saved me a lot of time. I am a working mother and I don't get a lot of time to go to the dentist. She gave me an appointment according to my convenience and I really liked that. Thank You, Dr. Mareeswari and your staff for all you do! . Highly recommended as doctor is very interactive too and keeps the atmosphere quite comfortable. I will definitely only go to her whenever I have and dental problems in the future.
